data.text:
Colmar, the Grand Est, France

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: 48.081699, 7.355600.

The city of Colmar is a small community situated in the easternmost part of France, in the region of the Grand Est, right at the border between France and Germany. It is one of the most beautiful and atmospheric cities of the region and a key tourist spot of the Grand East, located alongside Strasbourg. The first settlement emerged there during the times of the lasting Saxon wars and since then it has been developing as a multi-national and multi-cultural community. It has a truly lovely setting on the River of Lauch, near the Vosges range. Modern Colmar is a residential city and is known for its very sunny climate, amazing local cuisine, a variety of local wines, nice and friendly people, and a city where there is lot of fun to do.
